actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Davis-Bacon Act to provide that a laborer or mechanic hired by a contractor shall be paid appropriate mechanics' or apprentices' wages for periods during which such laborer or mechanic uses the materials, equipment, or tools of the trade involved.

summary.text: Amends the Davis- Bacon Act to direct that a laborer or mechanic hired by a public contractor be paid appropriate mechanic's or apprentice's wages for periods during which such laborer or mechanic uses the materials, equipment, or tools of the trade involved.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Davis-Bacon Act to provide that a laborer or mechanic hired by a contractor shall be paid appropriate mechanics' or apprentices' wages for periods during which such laborer or mechanic uses the materials, equipment, or tools of the trade involved.
